name: val-consultant
description: VAL - Virtual AI Consultant MVP by GemSquash

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:websocket" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev:with-scraper: concurrently "npm run start:scraper" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:websocket" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run start:scraper" "npm run start:transcriber" "npm run start:vector-store" "npm run start:task-engine" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:websocket" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend/node-services && npm install

author: GemSquash
